node.description: In the first ever [The Everything2 Podcast|E2 Podcast], Heisenberg reads [Buying lingerie for your girlfriend - the definitive guide] by [Paraclete], [January 22, 2004] by [Lovejoyman] and [He said 'tentacle porn', so I stuck my dick in a toaster and went from there] by [McSey].
node.title: E2 Podcast Season 1, Episode 1
